## Champion class

A representation of a League of Legends champion.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Champion 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, data, damage, meraki)](./shieldbow.champion._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Champion</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [allyTips](./shieldbow.champion.allytips.md) |  | string\[\] | An array of tips to play as/along this champion. |
|  [attackType](./shieldbow.champion.attacktype.md) |  | string | The type of this champion's basic attacks - RANGED or MELEE. |
|  [blurb](./shieldbow.champion.blurb.md) |  | string | A shortened version of the champion's lore. |
|  [classes](./shieldbow.champion.classes.md) |  | string\[\] | The champion classes this champion belongs to, such as - Fighter, Tank, Assassin, etc. |
|  [defaultLoadingScreen](./shieldbow.champion.defaultloadingscreen.md) |  | string | The champion's default skin loading screen art. |
|  [defaultSplashArt](./shieldbow.champion.defaultsplashart.md) |  | string | The champion's default skin splash art. |
|  [enemyTips](./shieldbow.champion.enemytips.md) |  | string\[\] | An array of tips to play against this champion. |
|  [icon](./shieldbow.champion.icon.md) |  | string | A URL to the champion's icon. |
|  [id](./shieldbow.champion.id.md) |  | string | The ID of the champion. To get the ID, in the champion's name - Capitalize the words - Remove any spaces and special characters - The words after a <code>'</code> - such as in Kai'sa, remain lowercase.<!-- -->Examples: - Kayn -<!-- -->&gt; Kayn - Cho'Gath -<!-- -->&gt; Chogath - Dr. Mundo -<!-- -->&gt; DrMundo<!-- -->There are 2 exceptions to this rule. 1. Wukong -<!-- -->&gt; MonkeyKing 2. Renata Glasc -<!-- -->&gt; Renata |
|  [key](./shieldbow.champion.key.md) |  | number | The key - a 3-digit number, that is used to identify the champion. |
|  [lore](./shieldbow.champion.lore.md) |  | string | The complete lore of the champion. |
|  [name](./shieldbow.champion.name.md) |  | string | The name of the champion. |
|  [passive](./shieldbow.champion.passive.md) |  | { name: string; icon: string; description: string; } | The champion's passive ability summarized. |
|  [pricing](./shieldbow.champion.pricing.md) |  | { be: number; rp: number; sale: number; } | The in-game pricing of the champion. |
|  [ratings](./shieldbow.champion.ratings.md) |  | { magic: number; difficulty: number; defense: number; attack: number; } | The champion's magic, defense, attack, difficulty ratings. |
|  [releaseDate](./shieldbow.champion.releasedate.md) |  | string | The date this champion was released on. |
|  [releasePatch](./shieldbow.champion.releasepatch.md) |  | string | The patch this champion was introduced to the live servers. |
|  [resource](./shieldbow.champion.resource.md) |  | string | The resource represented by the bar below this champion's health bar in game. |
|  [skins](./shieldbow.champion.skins.md) |  | Collection&lt;number, [ChampionSkin](./shieldbow.championskin.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A collection of the available skins for this champion. The default skin always has the id - <code>0</code>. |
|  [spells](./shieldbow.champion.spells.md) |  | Collection&lt;'Q' \| 'W' \| 'E' \| 'R', [ChampionSpell](./shieldbow.championspell.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The champion's spells (abilities), mapped by the key they are assigned to, by default - Q, W, E, R, respectively. |
|  [stats](./shieldbow.champion.stats.md) |  | Collection&lt;[Stats](./shieldbow.stats.md)<!-- -->, [ChampionStat](./shieldbow.championstat.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A collection of the champion's base stats. |
|  [title](./shieldbow.champion.title.md) |  | string | A title given to the champion based on their lore. |
